comments: She reminds me of my late grandma; very sweet and kind. just do one lesson a day and you\'ll do fine. come on, it\'s keyboarding. What\'s so hard about that?

comments: Very Lenient on assignments, which i loved. However there is so much work and very little direction or help on how to do it. Whenever i tried to schedule a time to meet with her, her time was limited.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Waste of time and money...

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: She didn\'t answer my questions. Her whole syllabus didn\'t really make too much sense. There was a point where I had to search the program to find where to take my typing test because it wasn\'t listed on the syllabus of where to look. She took forever to email back.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I am taking her practical accounting class online and she is not helpful at all. I have emailed her numerous times asking simple questions, many of them yes or no. She never emails back. My recommendation is to not take her online class if you will need any help at all with the subject.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Ellen is the nicest person and the best Practical Accounting teacher you could ever get. It was really a hard subject for me, but knew I was really trying. I dropped and took the falling quarter from her and "it clicked." She was so patient and understanding and a great teacher. Accounting for me was just really hard, but she made it "click".

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: please retire class is loud i got very little help

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Hve Ellen for keyboarding and accounting. EAsiest classes ever. Weak teacher but sweet as pie. She sits in the front of the classroom during keyboarding and works on the computer the entire class, so it\'s an esy A. I leave class and she doesn\'t know it. If you want an A in class take her. If you need to learn something avoid her. SPSCC is a joke!

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Wake me up when class is over....

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I agree BORING! She\'s slow and repetative...she says the same thing over and over and over and over and over. I wanted to take Groshill (sp)or McGaffick--they come highly recommended. AVOID Grandma Ellen at all costs unless you are brand new to computers or Word. She would make a great elementary teacher but she is not a college professor material.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Trust me she\'s a snoozer. most boring teacher Ive had at SPSCC. I could not show up to class at all and not miss a thing. She has difficulty hearing and seeing. Students have to YELL at her to get her attention. She\'s very soft spoken and students walk all over her. She need better classroom management and current information--this is not the 60\'s!

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I agree she\'s nice but to slow. Honestly she should retire. Her examples are outdated and she\'s hard to hear, and its difficult to stay awake in her class. I\'ve also had her for 3 other classes and they\'re all the same. It\'s an easy A if you don\'t mind being bored.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: best teacher ever - very nice

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Ellen is a very nice lady and I like her a lot BUT she is hard of hearing, speaks very softly, and probably won\'t see you raise your hand. I did learn something in her class but I know there was a lot more I could have learned. She\'s quite slow and very methodical. You can read the book and pass the class. Great teacher for 1st time student.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Very nice teacher and will help you whenever you need it! One of the best teachers I have come across at sps

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Never answers questions... she makes you even more confused and doesnt show you the easy way to do things she wants everything drawn out...nice lady, easy class but if you dont know computers you\'ll hate it

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Nice lady but very slow... if your an impacient person beware!! she explains EVERYTHING like 3times step by step! it makes the class really easy but SOSOSO boring! I\'m counting the days until we\'re done...But again she\'s a wonderful person!!

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Had her for both accounting and Word. Caring and kind, willing to help. Word was easy and accounting more difficult for me. Some students complain about being ignored, but she has explained that she has trouble seeing and needs students to call out rather than raise a hand. Overall, great teacher.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: CAN\'T WAIT TILL THIS CLASS IS OVER. NOT HELPFULL MUCH. SURE YOU CAN GO IN ON A FRIDAY, BUT DURRING CLASS TIME HAD MY DAMN HAND UP FOR OVER 5 MINUTES AND NEVER BOTHERD ONCE TO ASSIST..SO WHAT EVER LADY!THIS CLASS SUCKED...WISHED KERN WAS THE INSTRUCTOR...BUT THAT WOULD BE A PERFECT WORLD.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Great Teacher for Practical Accounting. Very nice and always willing to helpful. One of the best teachers I have ever had. Not an easy class but she made it a lot better.
